path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Enrex Staking Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Integer Overflow
findings.description: Certain mathematical operations are missing overflow checks which might generate overflow errors.

findings.title: Missing Account Verification
findings.description: Certain contexts lack a safety check in the account addresses, accounts that are passed to the instruction should all be verified, otherwise, the program may have unexpected behaviors.
